author: minfrin
msg: simple MPM: Lift the restriction that prevents mod_ssl taking
full advantage of the event MPM. Enable the ability for a module
to reverse the sense of a poll event from a read to a write or vice

msg: AVRO-1300. Java: Fix generated copy constructors to copy field values.  Contributed by taton.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-4749: Clean up and refactor CoreContainer code around solr.xml and SolrCore management.

author: minfrin
msg: core, mod_ssl: Lift the restriction that prevents mod_ssl taking
full advantage of the event MPM. Enable the ability for a module
to reverse the sense of a poll event from a read to a write or vice
